lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Lawson said he told Brazilian Finance Minister Dilson Funaro here in February that Britain would not intervene and press British commercial banks into giving Brazil easier borrowing conditions.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Paris accord set objectives for such sectors as growth, inflation, current account and trade balances, budget performances, monetary conditions and exchange rates.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "On Tuesday I shall be going to Washington for meetings of the (IMF) Interim Committee and Development Committee, and we shall of course be having a meeting of the G-7," Lawson said.
